Name: Grand Élixir
Ingredients: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The name refers to the inclusion of Yellow Chartreuse which combines well with cachaça in this drink with honey and lemon juice.
History: Adapted from a drink originally served at Franklin Southie (now closed) in Boston, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Grand Élixir contains 219 calories
